Find the COVID Testing and Assessment Centre | Government of Yukon

attrs.name: description
attrs.content: Find out where to go for a COVID-19 health assessment if you're experiencing respiratory illnesses. Whitehorse. Testing and assessment centre. Respiratory assessment. RAC, CTAC, CTC.

Find the COVID Testing and Assessment Centre
If you have a health concern
For medical questions or if you feel ill, phone 811, or launch the
COVID-19 Testing and Assessment Centre (make an appointment)
When is the COVID-19 testing centre open?
COVID-19 Testing and Assessment Centre (CTAC) is open 8:30 a.m. to 6 p.m., Monday through Sunday.
Phone 867-393-3083 in advance for an appointment.
We'll set you up with an appointment.
You may be asked to wait outside or in your vehicle before your test. Dress appropriately for the weather.
Who should go to the centre and when
The centre is for people who:
49A Waterfront Place in Whitehorse. The centre is in the building beside the Motor Vehicles office, across the parking lot from Boston Pizza.
